code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowReelForm=_ref=>{let{onShowReelCreated}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState('');const[videoStandard,setVideoStandard]=useState('PAL');const[videoDefinition,setVideoDefinition]=useState('HD');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('/show_reels',{name,videoStandard,videoDefinition});onShowReelCreated(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("There was an error creating the show reel!",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Video Standard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:videoStandard,onChange:e=>setVideoStandard(e.target.value),required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"PAL",children:"PAL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"NTSC",children:"NTSC"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Video Definition"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:videoDefinition,onChange:e=>setVideoDefinition(e.target.value),required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"SD",children:"SD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"HD",children:"HD"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Create Show Reel"})]});};export default ShowReelForm;
